entity.cobblemon.pokemon.tip: There are many Pokemons inhabiting this world. Are you going to catch 'em all?
item.cobblemon.red_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.blue_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.yellow_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.green_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.pink_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.black_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.white_apricorn.tip: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.
item.cobblemon.poke_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.citrine_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.verdant_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.azure_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.roseate_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.slate_ball.tip: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It's thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.
item.cobblemon.premier_ball.tip: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.
item.cobblemon.ancient_poke_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.ancient_citrine_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.ancient_verdant_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.ancient_azure_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials..
item.cobblemon.ancient_roseate_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.ancient_slate_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.ancient_premier_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that can be thrown at wild Pokémon in order to catch them. These balls can be crafted by hand if you gather the necessary materials.
item.cobblemon.great_ball.tip: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball.
item.cobblemon.ultra_ball.tip: An ultra-high performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.
item.cobblemon.master_ball.tip: The very best Poké Ball with the ultimate level of performance. With it, you will catch any wild Pokémon without fail.
item.cobblemon.ancient_great_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a standard Poké Ball does.
item.cobblemon.ancient_ultra_ball.tip: A mysterious ball that provides an even higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball does.
